ch0222_00_kagari/0101_0701_02_10: You... Today, I want to analyze...again!
ch0222_00_kagari/7101_0701_01_10:
Team Magma...would be nothing without
Leader Maxie...
ch0222_00_kagari/7102_0701_02_10:
Many people... Pokémon... Ideas...
All here together.
ch0222_00_kagari/7102_0701_03_10: I want you...to show me around.
ch0222_00_kagari/7102_0701_04_10:
Everything. I’ll analyze...and report to
Leader Maxie...
ch0222_00_kagari/7103_0701_01_10: Tabitha. He’s my...teammate on Team Magma...
ch0222_00_kagari/7104_0701_01_10:
Aha. ♪
So many...fun...sync pairs on Pasio.
ch0222_00_kagari/7105_0701_01_10: There is much about you that is...unanticipated.
ch0222_00_kagari/7105_0701_02_10: I want to...know more. Much more.
ch0222_00_kagari/2501_0701_02_10: Leader Maxie. He’s very important...to me. ♪
ch0222_00_kagari/2501_0701_03_10: He always thinks...about what’s best. For all of us.
ch0222_00_kagari/2501_0702_02_10:
If there’s someone who’s important to you...
Target...lock!
ch0222_00_kagari/2501_0702_03_10:
But...Tabitha said that’s creepy...and...
Not. To. Do. It.
ch0222_00_kagari/2511_0701_02_10:
But...I’m not good at...giving orders.
Not like...Tabitha.
ch0222_00_kagari/2511_0702_02_10: You. Join Team Magma. You can...support me. ♪
ch0222_00_kagari/2511_0702_03_10: If you do, I can... Forever... Aha. ♪
ch0222_00_kagari/3001_0701_01_10:
Will you...come? To Team Magma’s...morning
meeting? Leader Maxie...would be so...happy. ♪
ch0222_00_kagari/3003_0701_01_10:
Pasio... An artificial island. Fun. ♪
I want to...analyze it. ♪
ch0222_00_kagari/3005_0701_01_10:
City lights...at night... For the development...of
humanity... For our...dreams...
